column2: §YStaple Right§!\nThe right of Staple allowes local inhabitants to buy any tradegood that is passing through, regardless of its original destination.\nProvinces with this modifier are allowed to import goods before normal provinces.

§YTrade Fair§!\nA Trade Fair is an international event, with merchants from far away visiting and selling their goods.\nProvinces with trade fairs can import tradegoods from further away than normal provinces and enjoy a slight boost to technology spread.

§YStaple Right§!
The right of Staple allowes local inhabitants to buy any tradegood that is passing through, regardless of its original destination.
Provinces with this modifier are allowed to import goods before normal provinces.
§YTrade Fair§!
A Trade Fair is an international event, with merchants from far away visiting and selling their goods.
Provinces with trade fairs can import tradegoods from further away than normal provinces and enjoy a slight boost to technology spread.
Taxes Reduced (§R-10% Local Tax Income§!) (Artisans Growth Incentive)
Turn A Blind Eye (Scum Growth Incentive)

column1: # On Main Modifier(s). Note that "Prev" is needed here for some reason - and it is case sensitive, i.e. "PREV" does not work!
